content: make 1 left & right youtube video ds doublestitch withyarninfront slipstitchpurl- make yarn over 1 left & right youtube video wise then pull working yarn over needle creating a german short row double stitch youtube video double stitch any short row method can be used 1 instructions round 6 ds p12 pfb p1 turn round 7 ds k11 kfb k1 turn toe round 8 ds p10 pfb p1 turn round 9 ds k9 kfb k1 turn cast on 24 sts using judy s magic cast on 12 sts round 10 ds p8 pfb p1 turn on each needle round 11 ds k7 kfb k1 turn round 12 ds p6 pfb p1 turn knit one round by knitting across both needles the heel has been turned continue to the heel flap round 1 *k1 m1l ktoonestbeforeendofneedle 1 m1r k1 repeat from * on needle 2 heel flap round 2 knit one round this section is also worked only over needle 1 work anydoublestitches ds asasinglestitchorhidethe repeat rounds 1 and 2 until you have a total of 56 wraps as required if using another method for short 60 64 68 72 stitches or28 30 32 34 36 stson row each needle round 1 ds k17 18 19 20 21 ssk turn foot round 2 s1 p26 28 30 32 34 p2tog turn continue knitting in the round until the sock mea- sures2 8 2 8 3 3 3 incheslessthandesiredlength round 3 s1 k 26 28 30 32 34 ssk turn or the equivalent for your gauge see sizing note be- low for further details please note the heel will be round 4 s1 p1 workthepatterninthebrackets worked on needle 1 a total of 13 14 15 16 17 times s1 p2tog turn gusset repeat rounds 3 and 4 until needle 1 returns to having a total of 29 31 33 35 37 sts ending after start the increases for the gusset the increases will working round 3 only be worked across needle 1 no increases will be worked on needle 2 return to working in the round by knitting across needle 2 at the start of needle 1 k2tog and knit round 1 k1 my1l ktoonestbeforeendofneedle acrosstherestoftheneedle thestitchcountshould 1 my1r k1 knit across needle 2 now have returned to a total of 56 60 64 68 72 sts round 2 knit across needles 1 and 2 repeat rounds 1 and 2 a total of 12 times you will leg have a total of 80 84 88 92 96 stitches and 52 workthelegofthesockuntilitmeasures5inchesor 54 56 58 60 sts on needle 1 your desired length heel turn cuff this section is worked only over needle 1 work the cuff in 2x2 rib as follows round 1 k32 33 35 36 37 kfb k1 turn round 1 *k2 p2 repeat from * to end of round for stitch counts 64 68 72 only repeat round 1 until the cuff measures 2 inches or desired length round 2 ds p16 pfb p1 turn round 3 ds k15
